item.title: Comment on Skiing Lesson Progress by Karima
item.dc:creator: Karima
item.description: Be a looks so happy! What? No mittens?
item.content:encoded: Be a looks so happy! What? No mittens?

item.title: Comment on New Year’s Resolutions – 1st January 2003 by karima
item.dc:creator: karima
item.description: I am SO HAPPY that you decided to do the deed (get married) in Buffalo, NY. It was grand!
item.content:encoded: I am SO HAPPY that you decided to do the deed (get married) in Buffalo, NY. It was grand!

item.title: Comment on 18th December 2002 – overnight Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia to Sydney, Australia by karima
item.dc:creator: karima
item.description: And look where the yellow brick road has brought you! To a yellow brick house with Nika and two amazing daughters!
item.content:encoded: And look where the yellow brick road has brought you! To a yellow brick house with Nika and two amazing daughters!

item.title: Comment on 17th November 2002 – An anonymous Lisu Village, North Thailand by karima
item.dc:creator: karima
item.description: Such detail! How do you do it? (receipts saved?) I know that notes were taken. They must have been massive!
item.content:encoded: Such detail! How do you do it? (receipts saved?) I know that notes were taken. They must have been massive!

item.title: Comment on 17th September 2002 – Ullapool, Scotland by karima
item.dc:creator: karima

item.title: Comment on 28th August – Boston, MA by karima
item.dc:creator: karima
item.description: Blurry memory? I find your ability to recollect amazing.
item.content:encoded: Blurry memory? I find your ability to recollect amazing.

item.title: Comment on Where the Buffalo roam… – 20th August 2002 by karima
item.dc:creator: karima
item.description: The tire wear explains why the little silver beetle had a perpetual flat while resting here in Buffalo. We kept pumping it up and it kept flattening.
item.content:encoded: The tire wear explains why the little silver beetle had a perpetual flat while resting here in Buffalo. We kept pumping it up and it kept flattening.

item.title: Comment on The Big Easy – 11th August 2002 by karima
item.dc:creator: karima
item.description: Sounds like a pleasant challenge. How do you spell labor? Labour? Disaster/disaster? Let's opt for humor/humour.
item.content:encoded: Sounds like a pleasant challenge. How do you spell labor? Labour? Disaster/disaster? Let’s opt for humor/humour.

item.title: Comment on Christmas Cards 2011 by karima
item.dc:creator: karima
item.description: Received a card from your mum addressed to Canada!
item.content:encoded: Received a card from your mum addressed to Canada!
